property.name: Type
property.value: Artifact Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance When Cataclysmic Gearhulk enters the battlefield, each player chooses an artifact, a creature, an enchantment, and a planeswalker from among the nonland permanents they control, then sacrifices the rest.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Jason Rainville

property.name: Type
property.value: Artifact Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash When Torrential Gearhulk enters the battlefield, you may cast target instant card from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Jakub Kasper

property.name: Type
property.value: Artifact Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace When Noxious Gearhulk enters the battlefield, you may destroy another target creature. If a creature is destroyed this way, you gain life equal to its toughness.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Vincent Proce

property.name: Type
property.value: Artifact Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike When Combustible Gearhulk enters the battlefield, target opponent may have you draw three cards. If the player doesn't, you mill three cards, then Combustible Gearhulk deals damage to that player equal to the total mana value of those cards.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Greg Opalinski

property.name: Type
property.value: Artifact Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample When Verdurous Gearhulk enters the battlefield, distribute four +1/+1 counters among any number of target creatures you control.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Zack Stella

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on Aether Vial. {T}: You may put a creature card with mana value equal to the number of charge counters on Aether Vial from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Raoul Vitale

property.name: Rules
Flavor
property.value: Adi Thandray designed this helm as a tribute to his mentor, the great Daljit Gavaskar.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Lindsey Look

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lands you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color." {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It exemplifies the motto of the Luminary League: "Innovation requires insatiable curiosity and a good source of light."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Yeong-Hao Han

property.name: Rules
property.value: Imprint - When Chrome Mox enters the battlefield, you may exile a nonartifact, nonland card from your hand. {T}: Add one mana of any of the exiled card's colors.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Kieran Yanner

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a nonartifact permanent enters the battlefield under your control, you may return another permanent you control that shares a permanent type with it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With innovative stabilizing techniques, Suja Pavani brings this piece of the sky itself to the Inventors' Fair.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Noah Bradley

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may play lands from your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: By isolating liquid aether at room temperature, foundry hand Jitya Reyath has given us a glimpse of raw aetheric matter - the very stuff of the cosmos.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Chris Rahn

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Gauntlet of Power enters the battlefield, choose a color. Creatures of the chosen color get +1/+1. Whenever a basic land is tapped for mana of the chosen color, its controller adds an additional one mana of that color.

property.name: Artist
property.value: John Severin Brassell

property.name: Type
property.value: Artifact Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hangarback Walker enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. When Hangarback Walker dies, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying for each +1/+1 counter on Hangarback Walker. {1}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Hangarback Walker.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Adam Paquette

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature has haste and shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Equip {0}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: This matched set incorporates aetheric accelerators and deflection matrices in an elegant, wearable design.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Slawomir Maniak

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice Lotus Petal: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each of these intricate mechanical petals stores enough power to supply all of Ghirapur, if only for a fleeting moment.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Slawomir Maniak

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you. {T}: Add {C}{C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An utterly silent chamber, submitted by an artificer who wished to remain anonymous.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Volkan Baga

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Vault doesn't untap during your untap step. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {4}. If you do, untap Mana Vault. At the beginning of your draw step, if Mana Vault is tapped, it deals 1 damage to you. {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Kirsten Zirngibl

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent draws a card, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Developed and tested by researchers at the Consulate's House of Knowledge, these devices allow anyone to see with a visionary's eye.

property.name: Artist
property.value: David Gaillet

property.name: Type
property.value: Legendary Artifact

property.name: Rules
property.value: Metalcraft - {T}: Add one mana of any color. Activate only if you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On loan from a private collection, this unique mechanism extracts power from a carefully prepared gemstone.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Chris Rahn

property.name: Type
property.value: Artifact Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Painter's Servant enters the battlefield, choose a color. All cards that aren't on the battlefield, spells, and permanents are the chosen color in addition to their other colors.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: This whimsical automaton helps create beautiful murals, then stands guard as they dry.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Magali Villeneuve

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you activate an ability, if it isn't a mana ability, you may pay {2}. If you do, copy that ability. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Crafted in emulation of dwarven hearth decorations, these devices doubled the output of Amrit Vatyam's forges.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Yeong-Hao Han

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, {T}: Exile any number of cards from your hand face down. Put that many cards from the top of your library into your hand. Then look at the exiled cards and put them on top of your library in any order.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Jason A. Engle

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have Sculpting Steel enter the battlefield as a copy of any artifact on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Perfected by the kinetic sculptor Shanti Makam, these self-assembling metal strands can be coaxed into any shape imaginable.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Magali Villeneuve

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}{C}.

property.name: Flavor

property.value: Volkan Baga

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Solemn Simulacrum enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. When Solemn Simulacrum dies, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as Static Orb is untapped, players can't untap more than two permanents during their untap steps.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Reduction of energy and motion within the stasis field creates the illusion of slowed time.

property.name: Rules

property.value: "Top-performing automaton combatants are to be seized and modified for service." - Confiscation directive

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Black Vise enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. At the beginning of the chosen player's upkeep, Black Vise deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of cards in their hand minus 4.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each spell costs {3} more to cast except during its controller's turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Woven together, strands of aether can form a mesh of surprising stability, though such a network tends to pull power from nearby devices." - Consulate engineer's log

property.name: Artist
property.value: Jonas De Ro

property.value: Artifact Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: Imprint - When Duplicant enters the battlefield, you may exile target nontoken creature. As long as a card exiled with Duplicant is a creature card, Duplicant has the power, toughness, and creature types of the last creature card exiled with Duplicant. It's still a Shapeshifter.

property.value: Creatures with power greater than the number of cards in your hand can't attack.
